name: AppsGenii Technologies
description:
AppsGenii Technologies as an IT firm enable clients to out perform the competition and stay ahead of the innovation curve. Our business experiences are real and so are the results that we bring to our clients. We are always in search of exploring new frontiers for clients to transform their businesses, their thinking and their end results. Throughout all of the assigned phases, our people concentrate on design, usability, functionality and execution.
We work together to meet your business objectives which makes your experience of working with AppsGenii Technologies seamless. We make sure that our clients are in tune with our team’s every step of the way on a project to make sure that the end product looks and works exactly as the client envisioned. Whether you need a Mobile App, Responsive Web Design or Custom Development Solution.  CMS implementation, User Experience Design, or an E-Commerce solution – we’ve our resources aligned to stand and deliver.
Since its inception, it was the first time when AppsGenii not only scaled up further development resources but also started to spread its wings by moving out to a commercial office space. Since then, AppsGenii continued to excel and has successfully delivered more than 350, sizeable projects to 80+ recurring clients (and counting) across the USA, UK, Australia, GCC & Pakistan.
